kundoPitch: To use Kundo Chat together with SiteVision you need a subscription with Kundo. What about starting with a demo of how the product works, and go from there? Read more about Kundo Chat.
orgIdDescription: The organization id can be found in Kundo under Settings -> Copy and paste this code. You don't need to copy any code, you just need the ID from there. Inside the code block, at the bottom you find https://static-chat.kundo.se/chat-js/org/999/widget.js. The number right before widget.js is your organization id.
loadingText: Text when the chat is loading (optional)
